Name: Un Pas Fragile
About the game: Follow the journey of Camille, a frog who dreams of becoming a ballet dancer! 'Un Pas Fragile' is a short interactive experience. This narrative game is designed for all ages (no text) and features slices of life chaining in an unexpected way. • Play time – approx. 10 minutes • Independent Games Festival 2017 – Best Student Game + Honorable Mention for Visual Arts • Pégase 2020 - Best First Game
